name: Crashy Driving 2
description:
Crashy Driving 2 is a simple but addictive game to challenge your friends and have fun.

Challenge your friends and see who is the best player.

Drive and collect cash for more cars and more fun. Become the king of the roads and let your friends see who is the best.

Game Features:
👆🏻One Finger Play
👱🏻‍♂Challenge Your Friends
🚗Different Cars
👑Become A King
